pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cross-Validation for Model Selection // Run cross-validation of one or multiple regression models and get relevant evaluation metrics in a tidy format. Validate the best model on a test set and compare it to a baseline evaluation. Currently supports Gaussian and binomial regression. Described in chp. 5 of Jeyaraman, B. P., Olsen, L. R., Wambugu M. (2019, ISBN: 9781838550134).
